content.rendered:
Book your car in for a professional valet while you are away.

Our professional valet staff are ready and on-hand to provide the best service at Gatwick Airport and Heathrow Airport where we operate our meet and greet parking service. Generate a parking quote to add your cleaning service on.

Maple Parking Valet Packages.

Premium Handwash
Hand Shampoo, Wash and Rinse
Wheel Wash
Hand Dry (with leather)

Gold Valet
Hand Shampoo, Wash and Rinse
Wheel Wash
Hand Dry (with leather)
Interior Vacuum (excluding boot)
Dashboard & Interior Wiped Clean

Platinum Valet
Hand Shampoo, Wash and Rinse
Wheel Wash
Hand Dry (with leather)
Interior Vacuum (excluding boot)
Dashboard & Interior Wiped Clean
Boot Vacuum
Windows & Glass Cleaned
Tyres Dressed

Diamond Valet
Hand Shampoo, Wash and Rinse
Wheel Wash
Hand Dry (with leather)
Interior Vacuum (excluding boot)
Dashboard & Interior Wiped Clean
Boot Vacuum
Windows & Glass Cleaned
Tyres Dressed
Interior Wet Vac (seats and carpets)

Diamond Valet PLUS
Hand Shampoo, Wash and Rinse
Wheel Wash
Hand Dry (with leather)
Interior Vacuum (excluding boot)
Dashboard & Interior Wiped Clean
Boot Vacuum
Windows & Glass Cleaned
Tyres Dressed
Interior Wet Vac (seats and carpets)
External Hand Polishing
